definitions.definition: A city or region which is a major trading centre; also, a place within a city for commerce and trading; a marketplace.
A shop that offers a wide variety of goods for sale; a department store; (with a descriptive word) a shop specializing in particular goods.
definitions.example: With a name like “The Wine and Spirits Emporium”, no wonder the prices are so high.

definitions.definition: A business set up to enable foreign traders to engage in commerce in a country; a factory (now the more common term).
